property.name: dir
property.description: HTML: The direction of text display, either 'ltr' (left-to-right) or 'rtl' (right-to-left).

property.name: lang
property.description: HTML: The base language of this document.

property.name: title
property.description: HTML: An advisory title for this element. Often used by the user agent as a tooltip.

property.name: styleClass
property.description: The CSS class for this element. Corresponds to the HTML 'class' property.
